## Testing Checklist

- [ ] Previewed locally with `mkdocs serve`
- [ ] All links work correctly
- [ ] No broken images
- [ ] Formatting renders correctly
- [ ] Code blocks have proper syntax highlighting
- [ ] Navigation updated (if new pages added)
- [ ] Spell-checked content
- [ ] Verified on both light and dark themes

---

## Documentation Standards

- [ ] Follows existing style and tone
- [ ] Uses proper Markdown formatting
- [ ] Includes code examples where appropriate
- [ ] Has clear headings and structure
- [ ] Technical terms are explained or linked to glossary
- [ ] Includes relevant cross-links to other pages
- [ ] SEO metadata added (if new page)

---

## Accessibility

- [ ] Images have alt text
- [ ] Links have descriptive text (not "click here")
- [ ] Proper heading hierarchy (no skipped levels)
- [ ] Code blocks have language specified
- [ ] Tables are properly formatted

---

<!-- Any other context, screenshots, or information that would help reviewers -->

## Checklist for Reviewers

- [ ] Content is accurate
- [ ] Tone matches existing documentation
- [ ] Examples are clear and correct
- [ ] No spelling or grammar issues
- [ ] Formatting is consistent
- [ ] Links are valid
- [ ] Appropriate for target audience
